thread.title: Man in his forties killed in morning motorbike crash
thread.title_full: Man in his forties killed in morning motorbike crash

title: Man in his forties killed in morning motorbike crash
text:
Man in his forties killed in morning motorbike crash Independent.ie A man in his forties was killed in a motorbike crash this morning. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/man-in-his-forties-killed-in-morning-motorbike-crash-35501927.html Stock Image A man in his forties was killed in a motorbike crash this morning. 
Gardaí are looking for witnesses to the fatal crash which occurred at Ballymack, Cuffesgrange, Co. Kilkenny. 
Gardaí report the crash to have taken place at 9.15am. 
The man was pronounced dead at the scene. 
Investigators have closed the road pending an examination of the area by forensic experts. 
Witnesses or anyone with information is asked to contact Kilkenny Garda Station on 056 7775000.
